text: Sir David Valentine Willcocks CBE, MC (30 December 1919 â€“ 17 September 2015) was a British choral conductor, organist, composer and music administrator. He was born in Newquay, Cornwall. He was particularly well known for his works with the Choir of King's College, Cambridge. He directed from 1957 to 1974. ==Other websites== * Interview with Sir David Willcocks by Bruce Duffie, January 22, 1989 Category:1919 births Category:2015 deaths Category:British conductors Category:English composers Category:Entertainers from Cornwall Category:English organists
title: David Willcocks
